com.aleax.blight

Class AbstractTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aleax.blight.AbstractTemplate

  • public abstract class AbstractTemplate
extends Object
    Abstract template implementations. All templates must extend this class.

    Template instances are not thread-safe.

    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis

      • include

        protected void include(AbstractTemplate template)
                throws TemplateException,
                       IOException
        Executes another template and includes its output.
        Parameters:
        template - the template to include.
        Throws:
        TemplateException - if the template fails to compile.
        IOException - if the template fails to write output.

      • isCompiled

        public final boolean isCompiled()
        Indicates whether the template has been compiled.
        Returns:
        true if the template has been compiled, false otherwise.

      • execute

        public abstract void execute()
                      throws TemplateException,
                             IOException
        Executes the template.
        Throws:
        TemplateException - if the template fails to execute.
        IOException - if there was an error writing to the output.
